import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Grafico from "./App copy" function CdbInput() { const [investimentos, setInvestimentos] = useState({ cdb1: 0, cdb2: 0, cdb3: 0 }); const handleInputChange = (event, cdbName) => { const { value } = event.target; setInvestimentos(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [cdbName]: value })); }; cdb return (



); } export default CdbInput;
